duas.arabic: اللهم اغفر لي وارحمني واهدني وارزقني
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ighfir li warhamni wahdini warzuqni
duas.english: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, and provide for me.

duas.arabic: اللهم إني أسألك العفو والعافية في ديني ودنياي وأهلي ومالي
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka al-'afwa wal-'afiata fi deeni wa dunyaaya wa ahli wa mali
duas.english: O Allah, I ask You for forgiveness and well-being in my religion, world, family, and wealth.
O Allah, make me among Your righteous servants.

duas.arabic: اللهم إني أعوذ بك من شر ما عملت ومن شر ما لم أعمل
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min sharri ma 'amiltu wa min sharri ma lam a'mal
duas.english: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done and from the evil of what I have not done.
